entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: WSW 36 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
